rules_text:
[i]Godhood by Belief [/i]– As long as you control 3 or more other creatures, BOOOAL, False God has indestructible.
[i]Avatar of Murder [/i]– {T}, Sacrifice a nontoken creature: Each opponent may sacrifice a creature with mana value greater than or equal to the sacrificed creature’s mana value. If they don’t, wound each creature they control. [i](Until the end of your next turn, if a wounded creature would be dealt damage, it’s dealt that much damage plus one instead.)[/i]
